notes.title: Funding
notes.p: The Fieldwork in Kisantu and Mbanza-Ngungu (DR Congo) was supported by the VlIR-UOS fund through the project to support traditional practitioners in the Cataracts (TEAM/ATTC-Mbanza-Ngungu). The published data were obtained in collaboration with Ghent University, Kongo University, Kinshasa University, Kisantu Botanical Garden, and the Association of Cataract Tradipractitioners.
